title: Champions MIA From the New Map

embed.description: Explore the world of League of Legends through an interactive map of Runeterra.

body:
So far I have been able to find a lot of the champions on the new official map that Riot released, however there are still some missing, so far I couldn't find Nami anywhere. If this is just me please correct me, or you can try finding some other missing champions.
Additionally, there are also some major places and settings mentioned in the lore that I can't find on the map.

replies.body: Hey, you're right that not all of the champions made it onto the map. It's a bit trickier for some champions that don't have place for us to put them, but we'd definitely like to see every champion make it's way onto the map!

what is interesting is that some champ appear everywhere like dyrus, probably because it was a place he visit in some lore, but other like annie which had the same kind of location in her lore aren't there

I would also like to add that Nami's official territory, the Marai Tribe, can be found south of Mount Targon. However Nami is still not presented there. Personally it seems to me that her own tribe seems like an appropriate place to put her in.
Nami's region listing on her page is "Runeterra".

"A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken." The previous is a quote from the small summary paragraph that you see below her portrait on the Universe page for Nami.

Here is a link! https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/champion/nami/
Aatrox does not have a territory and is just wandering around Runeterra killing things to keep his body stable.
Yeah but he's from Shurima. Like we really just not going to include entire champions on the map?
if you go to Aatrox's page you will see that his region is listed as "Runterra".

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

Doesn't make him any less shuriman.

Taric now being possessed by an Aspect of Targon doesn't make him any less Demacian either.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

It's not like Aatrox was exiled from Shurima. If you're born in Brasil but you live most of your life in the US it doesn't make you any less Brasilian.

The Universe pages just lists them as to where their current homes are.

{{champion:266}} has Shuriman origin but currently has no home.
{{champion:44}} has Demacian origin but currently abodes in Targon.

Another example is that {{champion:427}} has Freljordian origin but currently abodes in Ionia. It would be nice if the new map would list champions by origin can "current" location.
Several of the champs that are not connected to a major faction aren't on the map,their locations will be added eventually.
